measure_type.en: If your product contains materials made from endangered species

sub_text.en: There are criminal offences associated with moving or trading CITES-controlled species if you donâ€™t have a valid permit or certificate. If your goods are covered by the Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora (CITES), you need a CITES certificate. Use Species+ to find out if your specimen is on the CITES list.
